! Title: ROLIST2
! This is a complementary list for RoList with annoyances that are not necessarly banners. It is a very agressive list and not recommended for beginners.
! Expires: 3 days
! Homepage: https://www.zoso.ro/rolist/
! Email: mail@zoso.ro
! Last modified: 13 IAN 2020 06:00 UTC
!Whitelist
